description: HeyCart is an e-commerce website that sells grocery items. On HeyCart, buyer can do login/signup, choose items from multiple categories, add these products to the cart and go for the checkout.
technologies: React.js, Redux, HTML, CSS, Express.js, MongoDB, JWT

description: This is my portfolio website developed to showcase my skills, experiences and projects.
TripTales is a travle blogging website where a users can share there travel experiences and read about others.
technologies: Next.js, React.js, Material UI, Typescript, PostgreSQL, NextAuth, Cloudinary
